Reviews.Content: i’m gonna start positives 1 cheap 2 location close subway station lovely parisian neighborhood awesome street market weekends little stores week it’s dirty run chose hotel cheap reviews ok figured trip paris we’re hotel anyway wasn’t prepared mold bathroom bathroom heater wasn’t heater barely looked it’s abused dirty rusty bed uncomfortable top blanket washed pillow bag clumpy rice pillow days front desk fix heater bathroom nice terrible dirty carpet it’s washed vacuumed bathroom situation pillows blanket bed didn’t change sheets day day ran towels yep clean towels walls pretty visibly dirty didn’t look promise am clean freak husband walk socks trying pick gross disease people stay maybe they’ve prepaid else yuk

Reviews.Title: “Fine hotel, adequate & worth the money!”

Reviews.Content: wife enjoyed stay staff polite helpful worth location amazing hotel perfect location block market street bakeries fruit vegetables coffee houses super market 5 minute walk villiers metro line 2 10 minutes walk monceau park 20 minutes walk feel walking instead taking metro arc de triomph quiet hotel lobby free wifi plus free access computer check emails sites etc wifi doesnt breakfast extra fee stuff nearby pleasent tv wasnt told soon tvs free satelite service heating arent airconditioned winter nice dont bad summer free safe plus minibar free storage bathroom ok theres bathtub shower curtain annoying water bathroom floor bed wheels pretty annoying cause easily annoying hotel defenitely adequate worth money budget pretty pleasent stay location

Reviews.Title: “Location Great, Room not great.”

Reviews.Content: convenient location metro shops restaurants staff friendly twin bed uncomfortable feel mattress springs cardboard pillows rug filthy shower head broken soap glasses provided safe didnt dont expect inexpensive hotel
